text: Hamdan bin Rashid Al Maktoum (, ; 25 December 1945 â€“ 24 March 2021) was an Emirati politician. He was the deputy ruler of Dubai and the minister of finance and industry of the United Arab Emirates (UAE). He was the second son of ruler Rashid bin Saeed Al Maktoum. Rashid Al Maktoum died on 24 March 2021 at the age of 75. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Emirati people Category:Asian politicians Category:Asian businesspeople
title: Hamdan bin Rashid Al Maktoum
